text:
FRONT DOOR DELIVERY



With Front Door Delivery, UPS can deliver most in-stock items within 3-5 business days. UPS is unable to deliver to P.O. boxes.



UPS STANDARD DELIVERY + PROCESSING CHARGES



ORDER TOTAL STANDARD SHIPPING

3-5 Business Days NEXT DAY SHIPPING

Add $26.00 Up to $15.00 $4.95 $30.95 $15.01–$25.00 $6.00 $32.00 $25.01–$45.00 $8.00 $34.00 $45.01–$65.00 $11.00 $37.00 $65.01–$90.00 $14.00 $40.00 $90.01–$125.00 $17.00 $43.00 $125.01–$200.00 $21.00 $47.00 $200.01 + over 10% 10% + $26.00 Gift Card only No charge $8.50



Add $6 for each gift wrap. For next day delivery, add $26.00 per address. Items shipped directly from the manufacturer and oversized items are not eligible for next day delivery.*



NEXT DAY DELIVERY + PROCESSING



For an extra charge of $26.00 per address, within the contiguous 48 states, we can arrange for next day delivery to most destinations. If we receive your order by 6pm PT Monday through Friday, you'll receive your order the next business day; orders placed on Friday after 6pm PT through Sunday will arrive on Tuesday. Monogrammed items take additional days for delivery. A delivery estimate will be quoted on your Payment & Review page.

*Next day delivery service is not available for out-of-stock items, personalized items or for items shipped directly from the vendor.

Have more questions regarding shipping? Please visit our Shipping Information page.

Easy Returns

If you’re not 100% satisfied with your purchase, we’re here to help.

Eligible items can be exchanged for a refund of the merchandise value within 30 days of receiving an order or seven days for Quick Ship upholstery items. We will issue a refund in the form of the original payment or with a gift card. Shipping charges may be applied to your refund amount.

How to Begin a Return

For Online Purchases: Visit our returns page to create a UPS shipping label or visit your local store to make a free return. For oversized items and quick-ship furniture, please call our customer service center at (866) 472-4001 for more details.

For In-Store Purchases: Products purchased in our stores cannot be returned or exchanged online or over the phone.

Items That Cannot be Returned

For our full list of items and conditions, visit our Visit our Returns Page.

Made-to-order furniture and rugs

Used or soiled items

Mattresses

Final sale items ending in .99 or .97

Gift cards

Personalized or monogrammed items

Still have questions? Visit our Returns Page.
